Pro Team

EVOS ESPORT

EVOS is a professional esports organization operated in Southeast Asia. Formed in 2016, they are best known for winning the first Mobile Legends World Championship 2019 and the Free Fire World Cup 2019 tournaments. In addition to their unparalleled trophy collection, EVOS also the most successful esports brand in the region, gaining the support from over 3 million fans across Indonesia, Thailand, Vietnam Singapore, and Malaysia.

ONIC ESPORTS

ONIC Esports is a Professional e-Sports Management Team founded in 26th July 2018. ONIC was built in belief where we see the future of entertainment is e-sports. E-sports scene in Indonesia is only at its early stage, and ONIC is here to step up the game with the spirit to be the best e-sports organisation in South East Asia. We manage talents and treat them like our own family and the best of all, make them shine with the best version of their self.

KILLER ANGEL

「JAPAN KILLER ANGEL」は2019年6月に設立され、世界にクラブハウスを有する日本初の女子プロesportsチームです。 本部のKILLER ANGELは2015年に中国で設立され、現在は100人近いメンバーで構成され世界トップの実力を誇っています。 JAPAN KILLER ANGELは現在LOL部門・PUBG部門・ストリーマー部門の3部門で構成されており、今後幅広いesportsタイトルでの部門設立を計画しております。 LOL部門の選手はゲーミングハウスにて共同生活をしながら、PUBG部門の選手はオンラインにて、元プロ選手をコーチにつけながら日々練習に励んでおります。

CS:GO

CS:GO is a multiplayer first-person shooter video game. The game pits two teams against each other: the Terrorists and the Counter-Terrorists. Both sides are tasked with eliminating the other while also completing separate objectives.

Cyber Hunter

Cyber Hunter is an open-world battle royale game featuring an unique combination of gaming elements, including survival, shooting and exploring. Any vertical surface in the Cyber Hunter world is climbable and players can glide down from high up. Equipped with cool guns, creative weapons and vehicles that fly and float, you can explore stories of justice versus evil, old fighting new, and conservatism fending off radicalism.

Cyber Hunter

Cyber Hunter is an open-world battle royale game featuring an unique combination of gaming elements, including survival, shooting and exploring. Any vertical surface in the Cyber Hunter world is climbable and players can glide down from high up. Equipped with cool guns, creative weapons and vehicles that fly and float, you can explore stories of justice versus evil, old fighting new, and conservatism fending off radicalism.

Cyber Hunter

Cyber Hunter is an open-world battle royale game featuring an unique combination of gaming elements, including survival, shooting and exploring. Any vertical surface in the Cyber Hunter world is climbable and players can glide down from high up. Equipped with cool guns, creative weapons and vehicles that fly and float, you can explore stories of justice versus evil, old fighting new, and conservatism fending off radicalism.
